an2.210-214:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing two qualities, one is deposited in hell as if brought there. What two? (20) Anger and hostility … (2) Denigrationand insolence … (22) Envy and miserliness … (23) Deceitfulness and craftiness … (24) Moral shamelessness and moral recklessness. Possessing these two qualities, one is deposited in hell as if brought there."
